column1: * 1892 - Arthur Tolkien sends a letter to his mother about J.R.R. Tolkien.
* 1940 - Voice actor David Collings is born.
* 1966 - Author and linguist Arden R. Smith is born.
* 1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Ken Jackson (4 January 1968).
* 2005 - J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography and The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien Humphrey Carpenter dies.
